courses.name: Studies in Communities and Their Schools
courses.desc:
This course examines education in communities and schools, differing perspectives on conflicts, values in education, and knowledge construction within formal and informal contexts. It includes a community-based practicum placement, online and in-class sessions.
This course is only available to students in the Bachelor of Education (BEd) degree program.

courses.name: Studies in Communities and Their Schools
courses.desc:
This course examines education in communities and schools, differing perspectives on conflicts, values in education, and knowledge construction within formal and informal contexts. It includes a community-based practicum placement, online and in-class sessions.

courses.name: Practicum
courses.desc: This course provides the experience of working collaboratively with a mentor in school-based practicum placements. Students will develop strategies and skills for articulating and demonstrating their growth as beginning teachers through the integration of theory and practice.
